channel.title: Armadyl 639 [Hyperion]
channel.description:
Allowed to post links now. [center][img]http://puu.sh/BI1W[/img][/center]
[size=18pt][b][url=http://www.armadyl.net]Click Here For Official Website[/url][/b][/size]
Armadyl is based off of Hyperion Created by Graham & Blakeman8192 and the Hyperion development team. We're going to spend countless hours onto making this the best 639 server out there. We are aiming to become one of the first Economic 600+ Servers. Credits to bando as-well ;)
RuneLegends development has stopped for now, we will get back to programming it one day. But enough of that lets get to the thread!
[LEFT][B]NPC'S FEATURES[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=green]NPC Defence System[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]NPC Clipping[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Npc Following[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Npc Dialogues[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]NPC Freezing[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]NPC Cannot walk ontop of each other[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]NPC Smart Path finding[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1m5oY.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]NPC BOSSES[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=green]General Graardor[/COLOR][/li][/ul] - With all the correct animations and delays, Graphics. as-well with his minions
[ul][li][COLOR=green]K'ril Tsutsaroth[/COLOR][/li][/ul] - With all the correct animations and graphics and the correct effects as RuneScape as-well with the demon minions
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Kree'arra[/COLOR][/li][/ul] - With all the correct animations and graphics, and you cannot use melee weapons against this boss. as-well with the minions
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Commander Zilyana[/COLOR][/li][/ul] - With all the correct animations and graphics and effects as-well with her minions
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Chaos Elemental[/COLOR][/li][/ul] - With all the correct attacks and the monster will teleport you to random locations in the wilderness and disarm you from combat.
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Dagannoth Kings[/COLOR][/li][/ul] - All their effects work properly and they all have the correct animations
[ul][li][COLOR=green]King Black Dragon[/COLOR][/li][/ul] - With all the correct attacks and animations and fire breating, anti dragon shields and dfs works against this monster
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Tztok-jad[/COLOR][/li][/ul] -With all the correct animations delays
[ul][li][COLOR=RED]NEX[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=Green]Corp Best[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=GREEN]Kalphite Queen[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=GREEN]Tormented Demons[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[B][LEFT]NPC'S[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Green Dragons[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Frost Dragons[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Red Dragons[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Black Dragons[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Iron Dragons[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Bronze Dragons[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Steel Dragons[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wTh8S.png[/img][/CENTER]
[ul][li][COLOR=red]Thieving from stalls[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red] Thieving from npcs[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cu19r.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Slayer[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Slayer Master[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Slayer Monsters[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Slayer Tasks[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/osXCG.png[/img][/CENTER] [B][LEFT]RuneCrafting[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=red]Altars[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Pouches[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Runes Multiple depending on what level you are[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]RuneCrafting gives you exp[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Abyss[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Tailsman[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QvkIY.png[/img][/CENTER] [B][LEFT]Crafting[/LEFT]
[ul][li] [COLOR=red]Gem cutting[/COLOR][/li] [li] [COLOR=red]Leather[/COLOR][/li] [li] [COLOR=red]Dragonhide[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1y8Z3.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Mining[/LEFT]
[ul][li] [COLOR=green] Correct Mining delays[/COLOR][/li] [li] [COLOR=green] Correct Pickaxe Requirements [/COLOR][/li] [li] [COLOR=green] Scans for the best pick axe in the inventory[/COLOR][/li] [li] [COLOR=green] Pickaxe are useable in the inventory.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kbbDe.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Smelting[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=red]Smelting All ores into bars[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Correct level requirements[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Possibility to smelt two ores depending on your level[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=GREEN]Shield attachments[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Beqwz.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Fishing[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Fishing Requirements[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Fishing Delays depending on your level[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Fishing Spots[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Shimp[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Anchovies[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Sardine[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Salmon[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Trout[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Giant Carb[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Cod[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Herring[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Pike[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Mackerel[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Tuna[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Bass[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Swordfish[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Lobster[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Monkfish[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Shark[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Manta Ray[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A4s6r.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Cooking[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=red]Correct Cooking Delays[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Correct animations[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Cooking burning[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]You will not burn food when you're 20 levels higher then the requirement[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Shimp[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Anchovies[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Sardine[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Salmon[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Trout[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Giant Carb[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Cod[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Herring[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Pike[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Mackerel[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Tuna[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Bass[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Swordfish[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Lobster[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Monkfish[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Shark[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Manta Ray[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Rdj5r.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Fletching[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=red]Bolt Tip Making[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]All Short bows[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]All Longbows[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]All Crossbow Stocks[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Onyx Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Dragon Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Diamond Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Ruby Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Emerald Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Sapphire Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Topaz Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Jade Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Pearl Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Opal Bolts[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NirJ1.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Prayer[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Bone Burying[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Bone on Altars[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Correct prayer draining[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Curse Prayers[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S3GK9.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Magic[/LEFT]
[ul][li] [COLOR=green]Correct Graphics[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green] Correct Delays[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green] Perfect Rushing[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green] Perfect Freezing Timers[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=orange] All Modern Spellbook[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=orange] All Ancient Spellbook[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red] Vengeance & Vengeance Other[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Clipped Projectiles[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6S0pG.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Range[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Correct Delays[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Correct Projectiles[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Clipped Projectiles[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Specials[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Bolts[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=red]Clipped Cannon Balls[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221055805/runescape/images/8/8b/Strength.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][LEFT]Melee[/LEFT]
[ul][li][COLOR=green]Perfect Weapon Timers[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Perfect Combat Formula[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Clipped Following[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]No Diagonal Attacks[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Correct Delays[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER] [IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100215200526/runescape/images/e/e3/Skillcape_E.png[/img] [IMG]http://imgur.com/RVzsD.png[/img][IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100215200526/runescape/images/e/e3/Skillcape_E.png[/img][/CENTER] June 4th Chaotic shields works like on RuneScape with the absorption etc. Example.
[I]After approximately 10 hours of combat, the chaotic kiteshield will degrade completely and must be recharged before it may be used again; it has a 20% charge
The chaotic kiteshield provides 7% melee and 14% ranged damage absorption for damage of over 200 life points. The initial 200 remains unaffected, but anything more will be affected. [/I]
Recharging Chaotic weapons/armor will cost you 4,500,000 GP. In replacement for dungeoneering tokens.
This will help balance out the economy meaning if you use the weapon/armor you'll have the pay the price once it's damaged, and this will stop players from prodding in the wilderness unless they're extremely rich.
6/5/2012-6/10/2012. Player following added. Lots of NPCS added into the game. Lots of Fishing spots added at the fishing guild. Most Bone Burying added. Tormented Demons are added. Corp Beast is better then before fixed some bugs. Kalphite Queen is added. Lots of NPC drops added. All of the NPCS are accurate like RuneScape including weakness. Which is pretty unique on servers.
5/31/2012-6/1/2012: Dagannoth Kings are almost completed. Corp Beast is completed
5/30/2012: Most foods eatable Most potions are drinkable Fixed up some bugs.
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KAM4r.png[/img] [IMG]http://imgur.com/gYrH3.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KAM4r.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/xQBI[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/xTbM[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/xQzS[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/xQA7[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/z0KI[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/zcBF[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_zmaioz7FNM[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QiHAXuQF51I&feature=relmfu[/youtube] [/CENTER]
[B]Developers
Huey Nando

item.title: Armadyl 639 [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Pvp 508, post:44, topic:444440”]Oh sorry for the lack of update notice.

Fremmy Slayer Dungeon is completed
Duel arena is completed <— With amazing staking/ obstacles clipped projectiles and so much more
Neizinot is the home
Shops are basically completed
The whole entire game is clipped projectiles and all.
Fight caves for a 2 days on the release will be 15 waves to obtain your firecape (Tokkul) is spendable
Spirit shields have the correct effects.
SOL is perfect.[/quote]

Sweet, PvP is going to be pretty good.

Read full topic

stick with starscape mate.

item.title: Armadyl 639 [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Pvp_508 Pvp 508
item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

Davidi2:

Ok but just remember that it may not be approved if it has play links and stuff like that. Forums and stuff are fine, but advertising isn’t. If you really want to advertise you may just want to be patient, I really think we may get a board for it, where you could just link to your advertisement thread in this thread so they work hand in hand.

Yer my forums doesn’t even have a ETA yet or any play buttons so I should be good man.

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl 639 [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Pvp_508 Pvp 508
item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:33, topic:444440”]Like Kronikz said, they get their website approved. And they get approved by a moderator looking at it, and we only approve them if they don’t have a way to play on them. We have a server status page for a reason, that’s where you should advertise. But there may be a server advertisement board coming out where that sort of thing could go, we’ll see.

This section is for showing off your developments of RSPS, cool things and stuff like that. Not to bring fame to your server.

[quote author=Pvp 508 link=topic=547131.msg4016124#msg4016124 date=1339640970]

That’s because they have PMed a moderator+ to approve there links. If you do not get them approved then its against the rules. Simple as that.

Why didn’t David just tell me that lol? I would’ve done that in the first place if I knew Since the last time my 474 development was in progress my website was allowed
[/quote][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=547131.msg4011168#msg4011168 date=1339221472]
I’ve removed your unapproved links and the image because it also had unapproved advertisement links in it too. You can re-add that image if you remove the links or get it approved in the proper section.
[/quote]…?[/quote]

Had no Idea what you meant by Proper section man, my apologies just read some stickies and found it.

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl 639 [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Like Kronikz said, they get their website approved. And they get approved by a moderator looking at it, and we only approve them if they don’t have a way to play on them. We have a server status page for a reason, that’s where you should advertise. But there may be a server advertisement board coming out where that sort of thing could go, we’ll see.

This section is for showing off your developments of RSPS, cool things and stuff like that. Not to bring fame to your server.

[quote=“Pvp 508, post:32, topic:444440”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=547131.msg4016114#msg4016114 date=1339640620]

That’s because they have PMed a moderator+ to approve there links. If you do not get them approved then its against the rules. Simple as that.
[/quote]

Why didn’t David just tell me that lol? I would’ve done that in the first place if I knew Since the last time my 474 development was in progress my website was allowed :p[/quote][quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:444440”]I’ve removed your unapproved links and the image because it also had unapproved advertisement links in it too. You can re-add that image if you remove the links or get it approved in the proper section.[/quote]…?

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl 639 [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Pvp_508 Pvp 508
item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:31, topic:444440”][quote author=Pvp 508 link=topic=547131.msg4016111#msg4016111 date=1339640444]

Is it really that hard to understand that you can’t be advertising on this thread? You’re advertising very blatantly in your video, removed…

Don’t understand the context of a development thread if members don’t know how to ever play once it’s done. If there’s members following the project how can you alert them? PM System works but it takes to long, this is a silly rule and I can’t believe it was made.

Huey, it’s not like like Runeserver, here we post our progress on how our development is going. It has nothing to with oh I just finished developing come to armadyl whatever. Just post your progress on what your updating etc and avoid getting in this mess :s
And if you want to advertise HERE also, then that is what the status page is for:3

I know I don’t mind the rules rofl, Personally don’t care you should know me by now I usually don’t stop until I got a point across.
Plus I stated it, it’s nothing like r-s -__-

but the thing that’s wrong is…

There’s other development threads advertising their websites
[/quote]
That’s because they have PMed a moderator+ to approve there links. If you do not get them approved then its against the rules. Simple as that.[/quote]

Why didn’t David just tell me that lol? I would’ve done that in the first place if I knew Since the last time my 474 development was in progress my website was allowed

Edit but no disrespect david Gotta admit Moparscape community is well more organized then the shit I moderate on r-s.
Plus created a approvement thread if you can check it out

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl 639 [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Pvp_508 Pvp 508
item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

Davidi2:

The point of the development section has nothing to do with playing the server at all, which is what a lot of people don’t understand.

The point of development does have something to do with playing the server, that’s like Rockstar is making an upcoming game and you have no idea on how to find out more things? So obviously they’re going to advertise their website to give them details about the game and whatnot / release dates and so on.

Same with Apple/Microsoft.

Let’s develop Windows 8 and when it’s almost done lets not tell anyone and let them guess when it’s out makes sense.

Oh Well your forum rules is much different then r-s. Plus there’s other development threads with websites advertised.

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl 639 [Hyperion]

item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

Davidi2:

Is it really that hard to understand that you can’t be advertising on this thread? You’re advertising very blatantly in your video, removed…

Don’t understand the context of a development thread if members don’t know how to ever play once it’s done. If there’s members following the project how can you alert them? PM System works but it takes to long, this is a silly rule and I can’t believe it was made.
